title: Most popular multi-purpose cleaning products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Product Type in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
Product Type Flash has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing and Cilit bang has the lowest Share of respondents currently purchasing.
The highest Product Type Flash has 18.0 more Share of respondents currently purchasing than the lowest Product Type Cilit bang.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Product Type, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Product Type on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 38.0 is found at Product Type Flash and the minimum is found at Cilit bang where Product Type is 20.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Product Type in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
Product Type Flash has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing and Cilit bang has the lowest Share of respondents currently purchasing.
The highest Product Type Flash has 18.0 more Share of respondents currently purchasing than the lowest Product Type Cilit bang.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Product Type, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Product Type on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 38.0 is found at Product Type Flash and the minimum is found at Cilit bang where Product Type is 20.0.
Second maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing is found at Product Type Mr Muscle.
The highest Product Type Flash has 18.0 more Share of respondents currently purchasing than the lowest Product Type Cilit bang.
Share of respondents currently purchasing at Product Type Flash is 38.0 , second place is Mr Muscle at 31.0, and thirdly is Dettol at 30.0.
Product Type Cif, and Cif (cream) share the same value 22.0.
The lowest value 20.0 at Cilit bang is almost 1.43 times smaller than the average value 26.5.
